00001 /* 
00002  * File: BlitzSolverMP.h
00003  * -------------------
00004  * This is sparse matrix solver from BLITZPAK for MP Connection
00005  *
00006  * Note that the class does not work because there is no Bliz solver
00007  * library for windows. Therefore there is no a seperate class 
00008  * BlitzSolver for 2P & MP
00009  *
00010  * If you want to use the solver in Linux or Unix, you ,may need to 
00011  * create BlitzSolver class for 2P & MP if you want to 
00012  * make it work nicely!
00013  * --------------------------------------------------------------------
00014  * Created    07/27/00          hcao     
00015  */
00016 
00017 #ifndef BLITZSOLVERMP_H_
00018 #define BLITZSOLVERMP_H_
00019  
00020 #include "LinearSolverBase.h" 
00021 
00022 
00023 class Facilities;
00024 
00025 class BlitzSolverMP : public LinearSolverBase {
00026 
00027 public:
00028         BlitzSolverMP(int nx_, int ny_, int nz_, int nConns_, int nComps_, 
00029                         const Facilities *pFac, double tol_, int maxIter_);
00030         virtual ~BlitzSolverMP();
00031 
00032         virtual void registerData(DataPool *dataPool);
00033         virtual bool solve(bool cR);                                            // solve AX = B
00034 
00035         protected:
00036         virtual void prepare(bool cR);                                                  // preparation before solve
00037         virtual void setupA();                                                                                  // setup matrix A
00038         virtual void setupRHS();                                                                                // setup RHS B from mRHS        
00039         virtual void updateRHS(const double *x);                // put the solution back to mRHS from x 
00040 
00041 private:
00042 
00043         char *SNAME, *GNAME;    // solver name and grid name

00054         int *ITA, *ICA, *IPV, *IT, *IC, *IR;
